external_games.name: Days of Memories: Koi ha Good Job!

name: Days of Memories: Koi ha Good Job!
storyline: Main character's hobby is taking photos, so he is happy to get a job at a professional photographer office, but the ends up just carrying apparatus and making unexciting photos for local news. This summer he wants to take such a photo to astonish everyone. A lot of different girls surround protagonist. What kind of summer will it be?
summary: In Koi wa Good Job!, the protagonist is a professional photographer who is searching for the next big model or scoop for his studio.
